title: Phylis' Pineapple-Banana Salad

directions: ["Drain pineapple and reserve juice.", "Cut bananas in chunks like pineapple."]

title: Fresh Cranberry-Orange Relish

directions: ["Process all ingredients in food processor using on/off turns until finely chopped. Cover and chill at least 1 hour.", "Makes 3 cups; 12 servings."]

title: No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies

directions: ["Thoroughly mix everything together.", "Shape the dough into little balls, then enjoy."]

title: Ambrosia

directions: ["Cut peel and white pith from oranges. Slice into circles. Combine oranges, pineapple and coconut in a large bowl.", "Cover and refrigerate overnight.", "Just before serving, slice banana and add to fruit. Toss all together and serve."]

title: Big Red Ice Cream
ingredients: ["1 can Eagle Brand milk", "1 (3-liter) bottle Big Red soda"]
directions: ["Put Eagle Brand milk in ice cream freezer, then fill remainder to the fill line with Big Red.", "Put lid on.", "Surround with ice and rock salt.", "Crank until firm.", "Delicious!"]

title: Orange Sherbet Surprise
ingredients: ["72 oz. or 6-pack orange Crush", "1 can crushed pineapple", "1 can Eagle Brand milk"]
directions: ["Place in ice cream freezer and freeze."]

title: No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies

directions: ["Boil milk and sugar for 3 minutes.", "Add peanut butter and cream well.", "Roll crackers fine and add to other mixture.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls on wax paper."]

title: Danish Pickles
ingredients: ["Desired amount of cucumbers"]
directions: ["Slice cucumbers very thin and sprinkle with salt. Let stand a few hours or over night. Rinse and squeeze dry."]

title: Frozen Chocolate Bananas
ingredients: ["1/4 c. peanuts, chopped", "1/2 c. milk", "1 large banana", "chocolate pieces"]
directions: ["Chop peanuts into bowl.", "Put foil on a plate.", "Melt chocolate pieces in skillet on low heat, stirring all the time until melted. Peel banana.", "Cut in half and place on foiled plate.", "Spread chocolate on all sides of banana.", "Then roll in peanuts to coat. Put on waxed paper and put in freezer until hard."]

title: Candy Quick Candy
ingredients: ["2 c. Quaker 100% natural oat cereal (fruit and nut)", "2 c. toasted pecans, chopped", "1 lb. white chocolate or almond bark"]
directions: ["Melt white chocolate in a large bowl in microwave. Add cereal and nuts.", "Mix well. Drop spoonfuls on wax paper.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Easy Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 large can cherry, strawberry or blueberry pie filling", "1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk", "1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Crushed nuts may also be added."]

title: Aunt Lee'S Punch
ingredients: ["1 qt. milk", "2 c. sugar", "1 small can frozen orange juice"]
directions: ["Pour milk in bowl.", "Pour thawed orange juice into milk and beat.", "Gradually add sugar.", "Freeze.", "When you thaw punch, add 2 quarts ginger ale."]

title: Chocolate Eclair Dessert
ingredients: ["2 small pkg. instant French Vanilla pudding mix", "3 c. milk", "1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip", "1 box graham crackers"]
directions: ["Mix pudding and milk together in a large mixing bowl. Fold in Cool Whip until all one color. Line a 9 x 13-inch pan with graham crackers. Pour half of pudding mixture on top of graham crackers. Add another layer of graham crackers then pudding. Top with a final graham cracker layer. Top with chocolate frosting. Chill before serving."]

title: Fruit Slush
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)", "3 ripe bananas", "5 c. orange juice"]
directions: ["Mash the bananas.", "Add the pineapple and orange juice.", "Pour into 9 x 9-inch baking pan (or ice cube trays) and freeze.", "Take it out of the freezer 15 minutes before serving so it can thaw to a slushy stage.", "Great as a breakfast dish or as an after school snack."]

title: Heavenly Fluff

directions: ["Mix all ingredients together; chill in a classy glass bowl."]

title: Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["1 can chunky mixed fruit", "1 can chunk pineapple", "1 can mandarin oranges", "1 pkg. instant French vanilla pudding"]
directions: ["Mix all together.", "Let set overnight in Frigidaire."]

title: Puddles(Candy)

directions: ["Melt together the milk and Hershey bars. Take off stove and stir in pecans.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls on waxed paper.", "Let chill."]

title: Fudgsicles

directions: ["Mix as directed on pudding package.", "Pour into Tupperware Ice Tups or popsicle containers.", "Freeze.", "Yields 12 Fudgsicles."]

title: Orange Sherbet
ingredients: ["6 Nehi orange drinks or 1 (2 liter) bottle orange pop", "1 can Eagle Brand milk", "1 can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Mix all together real good, then pour in ice cream freezer. Freeze as you would ice cream."]

title: Orange Drink
ingredients: ["1 c. orange juice", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 to 1/2 c. dried milk", "3 to 4 ice cubes"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients until creamy looking."]

title: Snicker Bar Salad

directions: ["Dice apples with peeling on.", "Slice bananas and the refrigerated candy bars into bite size pieces.", "Fold in Cool Whip."]

title: Sugar-Free Apple Pie

directions: ["Combine ingredients.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes; reduce heat to 350\u00b0 and bake until done."]

title: Orange Blossom Cream
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. orange juice, chilled", "1 tall can evaporated milk, chilled"]
directions: ["Dissolve sugar in orange juice.", "Whip evaporated milk until stiff.", "Combine with juice; mix well.", "Serve immediately."]

title: Nannie'S Apple-Cranberry Casserole
ingredients: ["2 c. chopped apples", "1 c. whole cranberries", "3/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients and put in baking dish, then make topping."]

title: Pink Lady Day Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O", "1 small pkg. mini marshmallows", "1 c. cottage cheese"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple; save juice.", "Add enough liquid to dissolve Jell-O.", "Mix Jell-O as directed.", "Place over medium heat, stir until marshmallows melt and cool for 10 minutes.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Pour into mold and chill."]

title: Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ["1 c. peanut butter", "1 pkg. white chocolate", "2/3 c. peanuts"]
directions: ["Melt white chocolate in double boiler over gently boiling water, stirring continually.", "When melted, add peanuts and peanut butter.", "Pour into pan and cool one hour.", "Cut into squares."]

title: Fruit Punch
ingredients: ["1 pkg. tropical punch Kool-Aid", "1 large can pineapple juice"]
directions: ["Mix Kool-Aid according to directions.", "Add pineapple juice. Chill and serve."]

title: Pralines

directions: ["Mix first 3 ingredients and bring them to a boil.", "Brown the 1/3 cup sugar; add to first mixture while cooking to soft ball stage.", "Drop on oil paper."]

title: Sourdough Culture
ingredients: ["1 c. milk", "1 c. flour"]
directions: ["Allow milk to stand in a warm place for 24 hours.", "Using a wooden spoon, stir in flour.", "Allow to stand in a warm place until it forms bubbles and becomes very sour.", "When ready, place in a large, loosely covered bowl and place in refrigerator.", "Never use metal bowls or utensils when working with sourdough."]

title: Cranberry Relish
ingredients: ["1 bag cranberries", "4 or 5 apples", "2 or 3 oranges, diced", "1 c. sugar", "1 large box dry cherry or strawberry jello"]
directions: ["Prepare the cranberries and apples in a food processor or blender.", "Mix together the oranges, sugar and dry Jell-O, then combine all ingredients together.", "It is best to let the relish set a couple of days before you use it.", "The relish can also be frozen."]

title: Snicker Salad
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) tub Cool Whip", "2 apples", "2 Snicker candy bars", "2 bananas"]
directions: ["Put the Cool Whip in a bowl.", "Next, core the apples, but leave the peeling on the apples.", "Dice the apples and put into the Cool Whip.", "Cut up the Snicker bars and slice the bananas.", "Combine all with the Cool Whip and mix together.", "Serve."]

title: Fruit  Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "orange juice", "sugar to taste"]
directions: ["Gradually beat orange juice into Cool Whip until the mixture is creamy, but not thin.", "Add sugar to taste.", "Serve with fresh or canned fruits."]

title: Low Calorie Banana Pudding
ingredients: ["1 small box sugar-free instant pudding mix", "2 c. 2% milk", "1 pkg. graham crackers", "2 small bananas"]
directions: ["Beat first 2 ingredients for 2 to 3 minutes on low and set in refrigerator.", "Place graham crackers in a gallon size plastic Ziploc bag.", "Crush with rolling pin.", "Place about half of crumbs in bottom of container.", "Cover with 1 sliced banana.", "Then cover with pudding.", "Slice 1 more small banana over pudding.", "Sprinkle with about 1/2 to 3/4 cup of cracker crumbs.", "Very good and low calorie. Makes 6 servings."]

title: Pear Honey
ingredients: ["7 lb. pears", "5 lb. sugar"]
directions: ["Weigh 7 pounds pears.", "Grind pears with coarse chopper blade. Add sugar and cook until pears are clear and thick.", "Add 1 large can of crushed pineapple and cook 15 minutes or until thick.", "Seal while hot."]

title: Chocolate Eclair Cake
ingredients: ["2 pkg. instant French vanilla pudding", "3 1/2 c. milk", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 box graham crackers"]
directions: ["Butter a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Mix pudding, milk and Cool Whip. Beat 1 minute.", "Put layer of whole graham crackers in pan.", "Put pudding over layer.", "Then add another layer of graham crackers. Put rest of pudding over this, then put last layer of graham crackers.", "Cool in refrigerator for 2 hours, then frost with Betty Crocker double Dutch frosting.", "Refrigerate several hours or overnight."]

title: Spaghetti And Noodles
ingredients: ["4 c. noodles", "1 jar spaghetti sauce (8 oz. jar)"]
directions: ["Cook noodles 15 to 20 minutes or until soft.", "Cook sauce in pan 10 to 15 minutes.", "Drain noodles and mix together."]

title: Grape Juice
ingredients: ["2 c. whole grapes", "1/4 to 1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Put grapes into each quart jar.", "Add sugar to each quart jar. Pour boiling water in each jar, leaving 1/2-inch space; seal. Process in boiling water for 15 minutes.", "Let stand 6 weeks before using to get full flavor of grapes; strain and chill."]

title: Pecan Roll

directions: ["Mix sugar, syrup and milk; cook to softball stage. Take off heat and add pecans. Beat until it starts to thicken. Pour into buttered pan. Cut into pieces."]

title: Hawaiian Fudge

directions: ["Combine sugar, milk or cream and well drained pineapple. Bring to a boil over medium heat and cook until mixture reaches the soft ball stage. Remove from heat and add pecans and coloring. Let cool slightly and then beat until creamy.", "Pour into a greased loaf pan.", "Cool and cut into squares.", "Yields 18 squares."]

title: Ritz Delights
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. chopped dates", "Ritz crackers", "1 can Eagle Brand milk"]
directions: ["Cook dates, pecans and milk on low heat, stirring constantly. Cook approximately 3 minutes.", "Spread on Ritz crackers (approximately 60 to 70).", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 6 minutes."]

title: Glazed Fruit Dessert
ingredients: ["1 (3.4 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding", "1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained (save juice)", "1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained", "2 bananas, sliced"]
directions: ["Combine pudding and pineapple juice, folding in pineapple, oranges and bananas.", "Refrigerate.", "May top with Cool Whip."]

title: Will'S Punch

directions: ["Pour pineapple juice, kool-aid and sugar in a gallon pitcher. Mix together well.", "Fill the rest with water.", "Put punch in freezer a few hours before serving, so the mixture will be slushy."]

title: Stewed Apples
ingredients: ["6 apples, pared", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Core apples and cut in wedges.", "Put in saucepan and add water to come to almost top of apples, but not over.", "Pour sugar over top without stirring.", "Cook over medium heat until apples are tender, about 20 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Covered Pretzels
ingredients: ["small hard pretzels", "chocolate candy wafers"]
directions: ["Microwave chocolate wafers in microwave until melted on medium setting.", "Dip pretzels.", "Place on wax paper on cookie sheet. Refrigerate until set.", "Can decorate with colored sugar before chocolate sets."]

title: Chocolate Eclair Cake

title: Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["2 diced apples", "2 sliced bananas", "2 diced oranges", "seedless grapes as desired, cut in half"]
directions: ["Mix together; add salad dressing."]

title: Snack Mix

directions: ["In a large bowl, mix together.", "Store tightly covered."]

title: Fruit Slush

directions: ["Mix all together.", "Pour into small Dixie cups and freeze. Remove 1 hour before serving.", "Good!"]

title: Edible Play Dough

directions: ["Freeze pineapple juice", "and", "apple juice in their cans. One hour before", "serving, set out the frozen cans.", "When ready to serve, mix", "juices with chilled 7-Up.", "No additional ice is needed for the punch.", "Yield: 30 cups."]

title: Madress Cooler

directions: ["Butter 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Line bottom of pan with crackers. Mix pudding with milk; beat 2 minutes.", "Stir in Cool Whip.", "Put 1/2 mixture over crackers.", "Layer crackers and rest of pudding. Final layer of crackers.", "Chill in refrigerator while making frosting."]

title: Baked Hostess Ham

directions: ["Lay ham on heavy foil and pour mixture over it. Stick 6 to 8 whole cloves in ham.", "Fold foil to seal.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes per pound. When done, punch holes in bottom of foil to let liquid drain out."]

title: Banana Clay
ingredients: ["ripe bananas"]
directions: ["Peel bananas and freeze them in an airtight container.", "Remove from freezer when frozen solid and blend in blender with a little water or orange juice."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 German chocolate cake mix"]
directions: ["Bake cake according to directions on box."]

title: Peanut Butter Fudge

directions: ["Boil", "together\tingredients", "until", "mixture", "forms soft ball. Drop", "a", "little", "dab", "of mixture in cold water.", "Remove from fire and", "add 3 tablespoons peanut butter.", "Mix until it begins to thicken.", "Pour into butter-greased pan, 9 x 13-inches.", "Let set until mixture is solid."]

title: Happy Apples

title: Fruit Punch

directions: ["Put Kool Aid in container and mix as directions.", "Add pineapple juice and and sugar.", "Chill until ready to use. 4 Makes 2 gallons."]

title: Fruit Salad

title: Fresh Cranberry Orange Relish

directions: ["Slice unpeeled orange into eighths.", "Remove seeds.", "Place half the cranberries and half the orange slices in food processor container.", "Process until mixture is evenly chopped.", "Transfer to a bowl.", "Repeat with remaining cranberries and orange slices. Stir in sugar to desired sweetness.", "Store in refrigerator or freezer.", "Makes about 2 1/2 cups."]

title: Kiddy Punch

directions: ["Mix orange juice according to directions. Then mix all together. Serve chilled."]

title: Apple Pear Honey
ingredients: ["8 lb. pears", "8 lb. apples", "8 lb. sugar", "1 large can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Cook approximately 30 minutes until it changes color.", "Place in clean jars and seal."]

title: Microwave Parched Peanuts
ingredients: ["Peanut in shell"]
directions: ["Put a thin to medium layer of peanuts in a microwaveable dish.", "Set heat on highest setting and run for about 2 minutes. Take out of microwave (use an oven mitt or small towel to keep from getting burned).", "Stir peanuts very good and put back and run for 1 more minute.", "Remove and stir again.", "Then run for 1 more minute.", "You can sample peanuts at various times and get the stage of parched peanuts you like best.", "You may want to run for extra time if desired.", "Peanuts will continue to cook some after removing from the microwave.", "Cooking time 4 to 5 minutes."]

title: Eclair Pie

title: Three-Step Cake

title: Apple Salad

title: Peanut Butter Punch
ingredients: ["1 jar peanut butter", "1 c. sugar or honey", "1/2 gal. milk"]
directions: ["Put 2 large spoonfuls of peanut butter in blender with sugar or honey and milk.", "Mix until all ingredients are blended and pour into cups."]

title: Grape Butter

directions: ["Slice apples in half.", "Cut out core.", "Spread the peanut butter inside and eat."]

directions: ["Mix together and serve."]

directions: ["Mix as package says and pour in 2 round pans."]

title: Era'S Shipwreck Cake

directions: ["Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Spread in the pan the chopped pecans and coconut.", "Mix the cake according to directions and spread on top of nuts and coconut."]

title: Holiday Relish

title: Sourdough Starter

directions: ["Put milk in a shallow pan, covered with screen or cheesecloth and let stand at room temperature for 24 hours.", "Place in quart jar and stir in flour.", "Let stand at room temperature (warm) for 2 to 5 days until very bubbly.", "When it has a good sour aroma and bubbles subside, it is ready for use.", "You may wish to catch another wild yeast if your first one is not active enough or to get a slightly different flavor.", "It may be kept ready for use in the refrigerator for several weeks before it is necessary to use it and refresh it."]

title: Easy Canned Grape Juice

title: Cranberry Salad

directions: ["Trim ends only off oranges and cut into quarters.", "Core apple and cut apple into quarters.", "Wash cranberries.", "Put all ingredients except pecans and sugar into blender or processor until mixed well and chopped fine.", "Stir in sugar and pecans.", "Let set overnight before serving."]

title: White Chocolate Crunch

directions: ["Melt chocolate over hot water in a double boiler.", "Crush pretzels and Spanish peanuts until they are large crumbs.", "Fold into the melted chocolate.", "Spread mixture into a thin layer on a cookie sheet which has been lined with waxed paper.", "Cool until set, about 1 hour, and break into bite size pieces."]

title: No Bake Peanut Butter Balls

directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Roll into small balls.", "Coat with cereal or coconut."]

title: Pickles

directions: ["Pour boiling water over cukes.", "Leave 8 hours.", "Drain well. Slice long ways and pack in jars.", "Add a grape leaf to the top of the cukes."]

title: Cranberry Jelly Or Jam

directions: ["Boil cranberries until they are cooked.", "They will pop! Strain skin and seeds.", "Add sugar.", "Keep boiling until mixture slides off spoon in thick sheets.", "Pour into your jars.", "Seal by boiling in canning jars for 10 minutes.", "Or you can store in refrigerator."]

title: Hot Fudge Cake
ingredients: ["chocolate cake"]
directions: ["Prepare chocolate cake of your choice in a 9 x 13-inch pan. Cool several hours."]

title: Candy

directions: ["Melt chocolate in microwave.", "Add peanuts and pretzels to chocolate.", "Stir and spread on cookie sheet.", "Put in refrigerator for about 30 minutes.", "Then break apart."]

title: Caramel Box Pie - Baked Nut Crust

directions: ["Place unopened can of sweetened condensed milk in boiling water.", "Simmer for 3 hours to caramelize.", "Cool."]

title: Jello Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["12 oz. cottage cheese (small curd)", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 (3 oz.) box Jell-O (I use strawberry)"]
directions: ["Mix cottage cheese, Cool Whip, pineapple and nuts.", "Add Jell-O; mix well.", "Add nuts or fruit on top if desired. Refrigerate."]

title: Healthy Apple-Walnut Muffins(From Great American Home Baking Cooking Series)

directions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Grease 12 standard size muffin pan cups or use paper liners.", "Beat together butter and sugar at medium speed until light and fluffy.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Beat in bananas until smooth.", "Mix together flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda.", "Alternately stir flour mixture and buttermilk into egg mixture until dry ingredients are just moistened.", "Stir in nuts and vanilla.", "Do not overmix batter.", "It should not be completely smooth."]

title: Dennis Scales' Peanut Butter Fudge

directions: ["Cook for 2 minutes after it starts to boil.", "Then add the peanut butter.", "Beat well and pour into a buttered pan."]

title: Dill Sauce

directions: ["Sprinkle salt over cucumbers, 2 tablespoons or so, and let stand 2 to 3 hours. Drain. Add freshly snipped dill, fat-free or regular yogurt and lemon juice. Mix and let stand until ready to serve. Very good with grilled salmon."]

title: Eclair Cake

directions: ["Mix pudding & milk. Beat 2 minutes on low. Blend in Cool Whip. Butter bottom of 9x13 pan. Line pan with layer of graham crackers. Pour half of pudding over grahams, top with another layer of grahams & rest of the pudding. Top with third layer of grahams. Refrigerate for 2 hours. After 2 hours, add topping."]

title: Chocolate Marshmallow Pie

directions: ["Melt and stir the marshmallows and chocolate bars until smooth.", "Fold in the Cool Whip.", "Pour into a baked pie shell, graham cracker crust or chocolate crumb crust.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Sherbet Punch

directions: ["Put sherbet in punch bowl.", "Add 7-Up, a liter at a time, until sherbet is mixed enough to drink.", "Don't mix too much 7-Up.", "It will be too thin."]

directions: ["Mix cottage cheese, pineapple, whipped topping and nuts with the dry instant pudding; chill and serve."]

title: White Coconut Cake

title: Punch

title: Peanut Butter Play Dough

directions: ["Mix until well blended.", "Add more dry milk if too sticky.", "Use it like play dough, then eat it!"]

title: Snowballs

title: Pink Easy Salad

directions: ["Place cottage cheese in a bowl.", "Stir in Jell-O.", "Add pineapple and nuts.", "Mix together.", "Fold in Cool Whip and refrigerate."]

title: Topsy Turvy

On the fifth morning, drain and cut large cukes into 1/4-inch slices (cut small cucumbers into 1/2-inch chunks) and return to crock."]

directions: ["Wash and sort cranberries.", "Peel orange.", "Grind all together (I use my food processor).", "Add sugar.", "I start with a cup of sugar and add more if it needs it."]

directions: ["Mix in large pot marked for 2 gallons.", "Add water to fill. Put in jug and freeze.", "Use strawberry or cherry for red, lemon for yellow or lime for green."]

title: Terri'S Fruit Drink

title: Unbelievable Salad

directions: ["Pour the pineapple with its juice into a small saucepan; heat until juice comes to a boil. Remove from heat. Pour gelatin mix into large glass mixing bowl. Pour pineapple and juice into gelatin. Stir until gelatin is dissolved. Chill until cool and begins to thicken, about 2 hours. Stir in oranges, cottage cheese and whipped topping. Pour into an 8-inch square dish. Refrigerate until firm. Cut into squares and serve. Serves 6."]

directions: ["Combine in blender; refrigerate.", "Will keep for 1 week or longer in refrigerator."]

title: Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. peanut butter", "2/3 c. honey", "2 c. powdered milk"]
directions: ["Mix with hands until smooth.", "Roll into balls.", "Bon appetit!!"]

title: Banana Split Salad
ingredients: ["1 banana", "1/3 c. cottage cheese", "1/3 c. crushed pineapple", "a cherry"]
directions: ["Peel the banana; slice it in half lengthwise, then put it on a salad plate.", "Put a scoop of cottage cheese in the middle of the banana slices.", "Spoon the crushed pineapple over the cottage cheese.", "Top it with a cherry.", "Yield:", "1."]

title: Chocolate Icebox Cake
ingredients: ["2 large boxes chocolate pudding", "6 c. milk", "1 box graham crackers", "8 oz. container Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Cook pudding according to directions on box in a 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Put a first layer of chocolate pudding, then a layer of graham crackers, then so on until pudding lasts.", "Put in refrigerator to set for 2 hours.", "When serving, put some Cool Whip on each serving."]

title: Chocolate Ice Cream
ingredients: ["chocolate", "sugar", "flour", "milk", "ice"]
directions: ["Put in three inches of chocolate.", "Put in three spoons of sugar.", "Add 2 cups flour.", "Put in 3 cups of milk.", "Put in 4 pieces of ice and mix it up.", "Scoop it on a cone when it is frozen."]

title: Sugar-Free Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["1 can chunky mixed fruit in own juice", "1 can pineapple chunks in own juice", "apple", "banana", "1 small box sugar-free instant vanilla pudding"]
directions: ["Drain cans of fruit.", "Save juice of pineapple chunks.", "Combine all fruit.", "Mix pudding with pineapple juice.", "Pour over fruit and stir.", "Ready to eat."]

title: Fresh Cranberry Relish
ingredients: ["2 c. cranberries", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and cut into wedges", "2 (11 oz.) cans mandarin oranges, drained", "1 tsp. granulated sugar"]
directions: ["In a food processor, combine cranberries, pineapple, apples and oranges.", "Blend into small chunks, adding sugar if needed. Chill and serve.", "Make 8 servings."]

title: Eclair Cake
ingredients: ["1 lb. box honey graham crackers (use all)", "2 pkg. (4 serving size) French vanilla instant pudding", "1 (12 oz.) bowl Cool Whip", "4 c. milk"]
directions: ["Mix pudding and milk, let stand until thick.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Line bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan with crackers.", "Alternate layers of crackers and pudding mixture ending with cracker layer on top.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Peanut Butter Play Dough
ingredients: ["1 c. peanut butter", "1 c. corn syrup", "1 1/4 c. 10x sugar", "1 1/4 c. dry milk solids"]
directions: ["Mix until well blended.", "Add more dry milk if texture feels sticky.", "Let children use as play dough and eat their creations."]

title: Just Corn
ingredients: ["corn", "peanut butter"]
directions: ["Peel and slice sweet potatoes.", "Cook potatoes in water for 5 to 10 minutes and add 1 teaspoon of vanilla.", "Save water to add later. Make dough like you would biscuits.", "Roll out thin strips and cover the bottom and sides with strips.", "Use deep pan.", "Lay sweet potatoes in bottom of pan, then put margarine on potatoes. Sprinkle sugar over margarine.", "Repeat potatoes, magarine and sugar until you use all the potatoes, then pour the water which you used to cook the potatoes in and cover the potatoes completely.", "Next, cut more dough strips and cover the top.", "Then brush or cut small pieces on top of the dough.", "Sprinkle sugar on top.", "Very old recipe."]

title: Pudding In A Cloud
ingredients: ["1 pkg. (4 serving size) Jell-O pudding and pie filling (any flavor except lemon)", "2 c. milk", "2 c. thawed Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Combine pudding mix and milk in a medium saucepan; blend well. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a full boil; pour into bowl.", "Cover surface of pudding with plastic wrap. Chill."]

title: Chocolate Pudding In A Cloud
ingredients: ["1 (6 oz.) box instant chocolate pudding mix", "1 large container Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix pudding according to", "directions", "on box.", "Put Cool Whip in dessert cups, leave a", "hole", "in the center of each cup for the pudding.", "Place pudding", "in", "the", "center of Cool Whip. Pudding will be circled by Cool Whip.", "Any instant pudding mix may be used."]

title: Pineapple-Banana Slush(Low Calorie)
ingredients: ["1 medium ripe banana, sliced, peeled and frozen a few hours", "1/2 c. canned crushed pineapple, drained (unsweetened)", "1/4 c. unsweetened orange juice", "4 large ice cubes"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in blender.", "Mix well."]

title: Edible Peanut Butter Dough
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. peanut butter", "1 Tbsp. honey", "1 Tbsp. powdered milk"]
directions: ["Mix all together to make dough.", "Makes 1 serving."]

title: Kria'S Tomato Soup
ingredients: ["1 (5.5 oz.) can V-8 juice", "1 (5.5 oz.) can tomato juice"]
directions: ["Use a small pan and pour both juices in pan.", "Simmer slowly until heated thoroughly."]

title: Homemade Cheese
ingredients: ["3 or 4 gal. milk (fresh cow milk)"]
directions: ["Put this in a bowl for a day or two.", "Skim cream off of the top, then let milk turn to clabber.", "Put in a large pot and heat until it feels warm to touch, then strain it in a flour sack. Hang on line and let it drip dry."]

title: Cranberry-Orange Relish
ingredients: ["4 c. (1 lb.) cranberries, washed and stems removed", "2 oranges, quartered and seeds removed", "2 apples, peeled and quartered", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Put the cranberries, oranges and apples through a food chopper.", "Mix all ingredients together and store in the refrigerator several hours before serving."]

title: Easy Orange Marmalade
ingredients: ["4 oranges", "4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Clean oranges with brush.", "Grind one whole seeded orange. Peel 3 oranges and grind pulp.", "Combine with sugar and boil over medium heat for 30 minutes stirring frequently.", "Seal in sterilized jars.", "Use heavy bottom pan for this."]

title: Apricot-Apple Jam
ingredients: ["10 lb. apples, peeled", "2 lb. apricots (dried)", "4 lb. sugar"]
directions: ["Grind apples and apricots. Add sugar and cook until thick. Makes 12 pints."]

title: Mandarin Orange Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can crushed pineapple with juice", "1 box instant lemon pudding and pie filling", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1 can mandarin oranges"]
directions: ["Mix together pineapple and pudding and pie filling.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Drain oranges.", "Mix oranges with pineapple, pudding and Cool Whip mixture.", "Save a few of the oranges to garnish the top of the salad.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Tapioca Fruit Pudding
ingredients: ["2 pkg. Americana tapioca (Jell-O brand) pudding mix", "1 can pineapple chunks", "2 cans mandarin oranges", "3 bananas, sliced", "some extra orange or pineapple juice, if needed"]
directions: ["Dissolve pudding mix in 3 cups juice (drained and saved from fruit).", "Bring slowly to boil until clear.", "Refrigerate until cool.", "Add fruit.", "Chill.", "Serve with whipped cream."]

title: Mashed Potato Candy
ingredients: ["1 small Potato (cooked & mashed)", "1 lb. 4x sugar", "1/2 c. Peanut Butter"]
directions: ["Mix potato and sugar together.", "Roll out thin, spread with peanut-butter.", "Roll up like a jelly roll."]

title: Christmas Cranberries Relish
ingredients: ["1 bag cranberries", "2 large apples, cored", "2 oranges", "1 large banana", "3/4 to 1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Wash cranberries in cold water.", "In an old fashioned hand grinder (use a coarse cutting plate) or in a food processor (a coarse chop) grind or chop all berries.", "Quarter but do not peel apples and grind into the berries.", "Peel and remove seeds from oranges and grind into mixture.", "Add banana last, then stir in sugar to taste.", "If you wish, you can grind in some grated orange peel for extra tang."]

title: Cranberry Streusel Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. cranberries", "2 Tbsp. orange juice", "1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients in saucepan; cook, stirring constantly, until berries begin to pop.", "Remove from heat and cool."]

title: 7-Up Prom Punch
ingredients: ["2 pt. cranberry juice", "2 qt. apple juice", "2 c. orange juice", "7 (10 oz.) bottles 7-Up"]
directions: ["Combine juices and serve when chilled.", "As you serve, add cold 7-Up.", "Makes 36 five ounce servings."]

title: Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. milk", "1 c. peanut butter"]
directions: ["Boil sugar and milk for 1 minute.", "Remove from stove.", "Add peanut butter.", "Stir and pour into pan.", "Cut when firm."]

title: Fried Pies
ingredients: ["1 Qt. apple or peaches", "2 Cups sugar", "Biscuit dough"]
directions: ["Cook apples or peaches with sugar on low until there is no juice. Using biscuit dough for crust, roll out small amount, then fill with cooled fruit. Close with fork and deep fry."]

title: Peanut Butter Syrup
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. peanut butter"]
directions: ["Add enough water to 1 cup sugar to dissolve, then bring mixture to a boil.", "Add 1 tablespoon peanut butter or more to suit taste.", "Recipe can be doubled and leftover frozen for future use."]

title: Yogurt
ingredients: ["1 qt. whole milk or low-fat milk", "2 Tbsp. yogurt (start from previous batch or commercial type)", "1 small can evaporated milk (optional)"]
directions: ["In a deep saucepan, bring milk to a rolling boil, stirring occasionally.", "Remove pan from heat; add evaporated milk.", "Cool to lukewarm.", "Dissolve 2 tablespoons yogurt (starter from previous batch or from commercial type) in 1/2 cup of lukewarm milk, blending thoroughly.", "Add this to remaining milk, stirring constantly.", "Pour milk into 1-quart heavy bowl or individual glasses.", "Cover with cloth, let stand in a warm place for 6 to 8 hours or until thick.", "Chill before serving."]

title: "Cranberry-Orange Relish"
ingredients: ["1 orange", "1 lb. (4 c.) cranberries", "1 3/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Juice orange.", "Grind cranberries and peel of orange.", "Add sugar and orange juice; mix well.", "Refrigerate several hours or up to 2 weeks.", "Makes 3 cups."]

title: Smoked Duck
ingredients: ["3 ducks", "Morton Tender Quick", "maple syrup"]
directions: ["Soak ducks in brine solution (Morton Tender Quick) for 24 to 48"]

title: Snickers Salad
ingredients: ["2 Snicker bars", "2 apples", "2 bananas", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Cut Snicker bars into little pieces in a large bowl.", "Peel and core apples.", "Cut into small chunks.", "Peel and slice bananas.", "Add Cool Whip.", "Mix well and cool."]

title: Chocolate Mousse(Diabetic Recipe)
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) chocolate Cool Whip", "1 pkg. sugar-free instant chocolate pudding", "2 c. skim milk"]
directions: ["In large mixing bowl, combine pudding and milk.", "Beat 2 minutes with electric mixer.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Spoon 2/3 cup into serving dish.", "Chill.", "Makes 8 servings.", "Two-thirds cup equals 1 starch and 1 fat."]

title: Christmas Punch
ingredients: ["1 large can pineapple juice", "2 pkg. Kool-Aid (cherry or strawberry)", "2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Pour into 1 gallon container and finish filling with water."]

directions: ["Freeze cookie dough 15 minutes. Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Cut cookie dough into 1/2-inch slices; cut each slice in half. Shape dough into balls; roll balls in peanuts. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."]

title: Orange-Pineapple Ice Cream
ingredients: ["1 can unsweetened crushed pineapple, drained", "1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip", "2 cans Eagle Brand milk", "1 bottle Orange Crush soda"]
directions: ["Mix Cool Whip and milk in a bowl.", "Stir in pineapple.", "Pour into ice cream container.", "Finish filling with Orange Crush. Follow instructions on ice cream freezer."]

title: Orange Salad
ingredients: ["1 large or 2 small jars pineapple-orange jelly", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 can mandarin oranges", "1 c. Cool Whip", "1 c. cottage cheese (small curd)"]
directions: ["Stir well first 3 ingredients; add Cool Whip and cottage cheese.", "Stir well and chill."]

title: Homemade Grape Juice
ingredients: ["1 c. grapes", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Fill jar with 1 cup grapes.", "Add the sugar and fill to top of jar with boiling water.", "Seal jars and process 10 to 15 minutes. Let stand 2 weeks before using.", "Strain grapes and enjoy."]

title: P B Fudge

directions: ["Combine sugar and milk in a saucepan and stir over medium heat until mixture reaches a soft boil.", "Soft boil, while stirring, for 10 minutes.", "Remove mixture from heat and quickly stir in peanut butter.", "Immediately pour into a 9 x 9-inch glass dish that has been lightly coated with cooking spray.", "After fudge has cooled for 5 to 10 minutes, cut into squares and leave in pan to finish cooling."]

title: Orange And Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ["1 big can pineapple", "1 small can mandarin oranges (11 oz.)", "1 (8 oz.) cottage cheese (small curd)", "1 big Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple.", "Heat juice and mix orange juice with jello. Then cool and fold in mandarin oranges, cottage cheese and Cool Whip.", "Then freeze."]

title: "Gorp"
ingredients: ["2 small boxes raisins", "1 c. salted cocktail peanuts", "1 (8 oz.) bag M&M's"]
directions: ["Add all ingredients in large bowl.", "Mix well.", "Makes a great snack."]

title: Lemon Ice Box Pie
ingredients: ["1 can eagle brand milk", "1 small can pet milk, 5 oz"]
directions: ["Beat together, then pour one little bottle, about 3-5 oz,", "of lemon juice in and mix. Pour into vanilla wafer crust and chill. Top with cool whip."]

title: Whatchamacallit Cake
ingredients: ["1 box German chocolate cake mix", "1 can condensed milk", "1 chocolate Cool Whip", "1 to 2 Whatchamacallit candy bars, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix the cake as directions say on back of box.", "Bake it in long sheet pan.", "After the cake is done, while still hot, take a fork and poke holes in the cake.", "Pour the milk over the cake and let cool.", "When cooled, take Cool Whip and spread on top of cake. Take chopped candy bar and spread over the top of Cool Whip.", "Best if kept refrigerated."]

directions: ["Take two apple wedges and spread with peanut butter on one side of each.", "Place 4 to 5 mini marshmallows on apple wedge side with peanut butter.", "Take the other apple wedge and place on top of marshmallows.", "There you have an Apple Smile!"]

title: Peanut Butter Balls

directions: ["Mix all with a spoon.", "Finish mixing by using your hands, kneading like dough.", "Roll into small balls.", "Stores in refrigerator.", "Great snack for toddlers."]

title: Betsy'S Grapes
ingredients: ["large bunch red seedless grapes"]

title: Peanut Butter Fudge

directions: ["Bring to boil and cook low.", "Test in water until a soft ball forms.", "Beat and cool until ready."]

directions: ["Prepare cake mix as directed on box.", "Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13 pan.", "Sprinkle over top of cake dry chocolate pudding mix.", "Pour over all 1 c. boiling water.", "Bake cake as directed on cake box."]

title: Roasted Peanuts
ingredients: ["plenty of fresh, raw peanuts"]

title: Mac'S Peach Blossoms

directions: ["Mix and pour over ice.", "Yields 1 gallon."]

title: Coffee Cake

title: Chocolate Eclair Cake

Layer bottom of Pyrex dish with whole graham crackers.", "Spread 1/2 of pudding mixture over the crackers.", "Add another layer of whole graham crackers, then spread remaining pudding mixture.", "Top with another layer of whole graham crackers.", "Pour cooled icing over cake.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Punch

directions: ["Prepare", "Kool-Aid", "as directed on packages.", "Add orange juice and serve over ice."]

directions: ["Place lettuce leaf in bowl.", "Place pear on lettuce leaf.", "Fill pear center with cottage cheese.", "Put cherry on top.", "Makes one serving."]

title: Peanut Butter Sauce

directions: ["Mix together until smooth and creamy.", "Serve with fresh sliced apples, celery or strawberries.", "Great snack for kids."]

title: Strawberry Punch

directions: ["Mix all ingredients in large bowl."]

title: Easy Sherbet

title: Cranberry Relish

directions: ["Wash and dry fruits.", "Put fruits into food processor and process.", "Add sugar.", "Process to mix well.", "Put in large Tupperware bowl.", "Refrigerate at least 24 hours."]

title: Punch

directions: ["Mix juices.", "Add sugar.", "Add enough Kool-Aid to color the color you like."]

title: Slush

title: Fruit Smoothie

directions: ["Blend in blender for 30 seconds on high.", "Serve in tall glass."]

title: Cranberry Relish
ingredients: ["4 c. fresh whole cranberries", "1 whole orange (without seeds)", "2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Grind cranberries and orange in a food processor.", "Pour into a bowl and stir.", "Mix in sugar.", "Place in a covered container and refrigerate.", "Allow to ripen for 2 days before serving.", "Serve relish with meat or fowl."]

title: Refrigerated Coconut Cake

directions: ["Bake cake as directed. While it's hot, stick with fork (or drinking straw) and pour Eagle Brand milk over cake. Let cool completely. Ice cake with Cool Whip, then sprinkle with coconut. Refrigerate."]

title: Old Fashion Date Loaf

Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for 6 minutes.", "Drizzle glaze of powdered sugar and water, mixed, over each cracker."]

When", "the apples begin to soften, sprinkle with white or brown sugar.", "Apples are ready when they are brown."]

Remove and cool on rack 10 more minutes. Serve warm or cool completely."]

Cook rapidly almost to jellying point, about 10 minutes. As mixture thickens, stir frequently to prevent sticking. Pour, boiling hot, into sterilized Ball jars. Adjust caps. Yield: About 3 pints."]

title: Real Maple Butter

directions: ["Fill your sink with at least 6 inches of very cold water before starting to cook the spread.", "In a large pot over medium-high heat, bring the maple syrup and corn syrup to a boil. Cook the syrup until a candy thermometer reads exactly 232 degrees F/112 degrees C., stirring occasionally. The correct temperature is very crucial in the process.", "As soon as the syrup reaches the correct temperature, take the pan off the heat and carefully lower it into the cold water bath. Allow the syrup to rest and cool until it reaches 70 degrees F/20 degrees C, about 30 minutes.", "When the syrup reaches 70 degrees F, remove the pot from the cold water bath and beat the cooled syrup with an electric mixer on high speed until the syrup forms a creamy, thick spread, about 3 minutes.", "Pack the spread into a container, cover, and ripen in refrigerator for about 2 hours before serving. Maple butter will keep covered in refrigerator up to a month. If chilled maple butter is too hard to spread straight from the refrigerator, allow to come to room temperature."]

title: Easy Banana Ice Cream
ingredients: ["2 peeled and chopped bananas, frozen", "1/2 cup skim milk"]
directions: ["Combine frozen bananas and 1/4 cup skim milk in a blender; blend for 30 seconds. Add remaining 1/4 cup milk and blend on high speed until smooth, about 30 seconds more."]

title: Easy-Peasy Mandarin Orange Ice Cream
ingredients: ["1 cup mandarin orange juice", "1 cup milk", "1 cup maple syrup"]
directions: ["Whisk orange juice, milk, and syrup together in a bowl. Pour into an ice-cream maker and freeze according to the manufacturer's directions."]

title: Sweet Cottage Cheese And Bananas
ingredients: ["1/2 cup cottage cheese", "2 teaspoons honey", "1 banana, sliced"]
directions: ["In a small serving bowl, stir together the cottage cheese, honey, and banana slices. Serve or eat immediately."]

title: Graham Cracker Pudding Pie
ingredients: ["2 (5 ounce) packages non-instant chocolate pudding mix", "6 cups milk", "1 (16 ounce) package graham crackers"]
directions: ["Combine pudding mix and milk in a large saucepan. Prepare according to package directions.", "Cover the bottom of a 9x13 inch pan with a layer of graham crackers. Pour hot pudding mixture over graham cracker layer. Cover pudding with another layer of graham crackers. Chill at least 4 hours before serving. Garnish with whipped cream and crushed graham crackers."]

title: Simple Avocado Milkshake
ingredients: ["1 cup milk", "1 ripe avocado, peeled and pitted", "1 banana, cut into chunks (optional)", "3 tablespoons honey"]
directions: ["Blend milk, avocado, banana, and honey together in a blender until smooth."]

title: Banana Juice
ingredients: ["2 cups milk", "2 large ripe bananas", "2 tablespoons slivered shelled pistachios", "1 tablespoon honey"]
directions: ["Blend milk, bananas, pistachios, and honey in a blender until smooth and frothy, about 2 minutes."]

title: Apple Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ["1 frozen bananas, peeled and chopped", "1/2 cup orange juice", "1 Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped", "1/4 cup milk"]
directions: ["In a blender combine frozen banana, orange juice, apple and milk. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve."]

title: Dried Bloody Scabs (Halloween Craisin Appetizer)
ingredients: ["1 (6 ounce) package dried cranberries"]
directions: ["Flatten cranberries between fingers and spread them onto a sheet of waxed paper to dry until they start to curl slightly, about 1 hour.", "Put cranberries into a bowl labeled 'Dried Bloody Scabs' and watch the kids scoop them up by the handful!"]

title: Peanut Butter Banana Ice Cream
ingredients: ["4 ripe bananas, cut into 1-inch slices", "1/4 cup peanut butter"]
directions: ["Arrange banana slices on a baking sheet and freeze, 8 hours to overnight.", "Process frozen bananas in a food processor until evenly chopped; add peanut butter and process until thick and creamy."]

title: Pretzel Smoochies
ingredients: ["20 mini pretzels", "20 foil-wrapped milk chocolate pieces (such as Hershey's Kisses(R))", "20 candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's(R))"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).", "Place pretzels on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil.", "Place an unwrapped chocolate piece onto each pretzel.", "Heat the pretzels and chocolate candies in the preheated oven until the milk chocolate pieces become soft but hold their shape, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Watch carefully and don't let the chocolate melt to the point of dripping.", "Remove the pretzels from the oven and allow to stand for 1 minute to allow candy to finish softening.", "Push a colored candy-coated piece into the center of each chocolate kiss, pushing it down and flattening it. Set treats aside to cool to room temperature and fully set, about 30 minutes."]

title: Carrot And Orange Juice
ingredients: ["2 pounds organic carrots, trimmed and scrubbed", "8 organic oranges, peeled"]
directions: ["Press carrots and oranges through a juicer and into a large glass."]

title: Whipped Banana "Ice Cream"
ingredients: ["2 bananas, peeled and sliced"]
directions: ["Place sliced bananas in an airtight container and freeze until solid, about 1 1/2 hours.", "Blend frozen bananas in blender until whipped and smooth."]

title: Apple Snicker Salad
ingredients: ["1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix", "1 cup milk", "1 (6 ounce) package whipped cream topping (such as Cool Whip(R))", "6 chocolate-coated caramel-peanut nougat candy bars (such as Snickers(R)), cut into bite-size pieces", "3 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and cut into bite-size pieces"]
directions: ["Whisk butterscotch pudding mix into milk in a bowl until dissolved.", "Stir whipped cream topping into pudding mixture.", "Fold the candy bar pieces into the pudding mixture.", "Fold the apples into the pudding mixture."]

title: Pineapple Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ["1/2 cup whole seedless grapes", "1 1/2 cups apple juice", "1 1/2 cups plain kefir (cultured milk)", "1 large banana", "1 1/2 cups frozen pineapple chunks", "1/3 cup chopped pitted dates (such as Sun-Maid(R))"]
directions: ["Combine grapes, apple juice, kefir, banana, pineapple, and dates, in this order, in a blender; blend until smooth."]

title: Licuado De Mango
ingredients: ["1 mango - peeled, seeded and diced", "1 1/2 cups milk", "3 tablespoons honey", "1 cup ice cubes"]
directions: ["Place the mango, milk, honey and ice cubes into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Serve immediately."]

title: Maple Frappuccino (Caffeine-Free)
ingredients: ["1 cup ice cubes", "3/4 cup milk", "3/4 cup pure maple syrup"]
directions: ["Pour ice into a blender; add milk and maple syrup. Cover and blend on a medium setting until smooth."]

title: Frozen Yogurt Drops
ingredients: ["1 (6 ounce) container Yoplait(R) yogurt, any flavor"]
directions: ["Transfer the yogurt to a small resealable plastic bag. Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper. Snip off 1 corner of the bag and pipe dots onto the cookie sheet. Freeze until hard, 1 hour. Remove from paper and eat with fingers, mix into oatmeal or throw on top of berries."]

title: Pineapple Delight Smoothie
ingredients: ["2 cups milk", "2 bananas, frozen and chunked", "6 pineapple rings", "1 tablespoon honey"]
directions: ["In a blender combine milk, frozen bananas, pineapple and honey. Blend until smooth."]

title: Chocolate Banana Pops
ingredients: ["4 banana, halved", "3 1/2 ounces dark chocolate"]
directions: ["Stick bananas with a lollipop stick; place on a baking sheet and place in the freezer for 1 hour.", "Place chocolate in top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes.", "Coat frozen bananas with melted chocolate."]

title: My Mom'S Roasted Peanuts
ingredients: ["1 pound raw peanuts, in shells"]
directions: ["Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Spread peanuts out on a large baking sheet.", "Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the shells are browned. Watch carefully, the peanuts brown rather suddenly. When cool enough to touch, break open the shells and eat!"]

title: Hot Peanut Butter Fudge Topping
ingredients: ["1 (12 ounce) can evaporated milk", "3/4 cup peanut butter", "1/4 cup honey", "2 tablespoons brown sugar"]
directions: ["Mix milk, peanut butter, honey, and brown sugar together in a saucepan over medium-high heat; cook and stir, scraping sides and bottom of saucepan with a rubber spatula, until topping is thickened, 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Homemade Vegetable Baby Food
ingredients: ["3 cups chopped carrots"]
directions: ["Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with 2 inches of water or just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add carrots, cover, and steam until tender, about 10 minutes.", "Transfer steamed carrots to a food processor and process until almost smooth, scraping down sides periodically. Add 1/4 cup water from the saucepan and process until carrots are smooth. Repeat until desired consistency is reached.", "Scoop 1/3 to 1/2 cup pureed carrots into sandwich-size resealable bags. Squeeze bag to remove excess air and seal. Flatten bags and stack in the freezer."]

title: Peanut Butter-Maple Milkshake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups milk", "1/4 cup peanut butter", "2 tablespoons maple syrup"]
directions: ["Pour milk into a plastic bowl and stick in freezer until semi-frozen, about 2 hours.", "Blend milk, peanut butter, and maple syrup in a blender until smooth."]

title: Tropical Mangolicious Smoothie
ingredients: ["1/2 fresh pineapple, chopped into chunks and frozen", "1 cup orange juice", "1 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks"]
directions: ["Combine pineapple chunks, orange juice, and mango chunks in a blender; blend until smooth."]

title: Orange Glaze For Ham
ingredients: ["1 (15 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained and liquid reserved", "1 cup packed brown sugar", "2 tablespoons orange juice"]
directions: ["Drain the juice from the can of mandarin oranges into a microwave-safe bowl. Eat the oranges, or reserve for other uses. Stir in the brown sugar and orange juice. Cook in the microwave for 5 minutes on full power, then stir and cook for another 5 minutes. Glaze will be runny.", "Use to glaze a whole ham every 10 minutes during the last hour of cooking. Also baste a few times after you take the ham out of the oven."]

title: Mom'S Carrot And Raisin Salad
ingredients: ["1 (16 ounce) package carrots, peeled and shredded", "3 tablespoons orange juice", "1/3 cup raisins"]
directions: ["Stir the shredded carrots, orange juice, and raisins together in a bowl."]

title: No-Bake Energy Bars
ingredients: ["1 cup pitted dates", "1 cup raisins", "1 cup cashews"]
directions: ["Process dates, raisins, and cashews in a food processor until desired consistency is reached. Scoop mixture onto a sheet of waxed paper and form into a square using the paper to help shape it. Cut into 10 bars."]

title: Peach Drink
ingredients: ["1 (11.5 ounce) can peach nectar", "1 1/2 cups orange juice"]
directions: ["Fill 2 tall glasses with ice cubes. Pour in equal parts peach nectar and orange juice to fill the glasses. Stir."]

title: Easy Pistachio Ice Cream
ingredients: ["1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk", "1 1/2 cups milk", "1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix"]
directions: ["Mix sweetened condensed milk, milk, and pudding mix together in a bowl; transfer to an ice cream maker and process according to manufacturers' instructions."]

title: Monster Bites
ingredients: ["4 apples, cored and cut into 8 wedges", "1 cup peanut butter", "1/2 cup candy corn, or as needed"]
directions: ["Slice each wedge of apple in half the long way, making two smaller wedges. Spread about 3/4 teaspoon of peanut butter on one cut side of a small wedge, and place 5 or 6 pieces of candy corn sticking out of the peanut butter for teeth. Spread 3/4 teaspoon of peanut butter onto the cut side of second small wedge. Lightly press second wedge to the tops of the candy corn teeth, with the peanut butter to the inside, to form lips. Repeat with remaining apples, peanut butter, and candy corn."]

title: Fresh Orange Juice
ingredients: ["4 oranges"]
directions: ["Lightly smack each orange on the counter. Cut each one in half. Squeeze into a glass. You may also use a citrus reamer to do this. If you want less pulp, use a hand juicer with a strainer."]

title: Orange-Carrot Juice
ingredients: ["4 pounds carrots, scrubbed and trimmed", "12 oranges, peeled"]
directions: ["Run carrots and oranges through a juicer. Strain juice and transfer to a 1-gallon pitcher. Refrigerate."]

title: Smooth Chocolate Icing
ingredients: ["1 cup confectioners' sugar", "2 tablespoons milk", "1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, melted"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, milk and unsweetened chocolate until smooth.", "Use this icing for dipping the Truffle Cookies."]

title: Mystery Salad
ingredients: ["1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks with juice", "1 cup mandarin oranges with juice", "1 cup miniature marshmallows", "1 large banana, sliced", "1 (3.4 ounce) package instant lemon pudding mix", "1/2 cup chopped pecans (optional)"]
directions: ["Drain the juice from the pineapple and mandarin orange segments into a serving bowl. Whisk in the instant pudding until smooth. Stir in pineapple chunks, orange segments, banana and miniature marshmallows. Mix in pecans if using. Cover and refrigerate until serving."]

title: Butterscotch Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["4 large apples, diced", "1 (3.4 ounce) package butterscotch instant pudding mix", "1 cup dry roasted peanuts", "1 (15.25 ounce) can crushed pineapple, in juice", "1 (16 ounce) package frozen non-dairy whipped topping, thawed"]
directions: ["Toss the diced apples with the packet of pudding mix and peanuts until well combined. Stir in the pineapple and whipped topping. Cover and refrigerate overnight."]

title: Creamy Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups milk", "1 avocado, cut into chunks", "1/2 cup yogurt", "1 banana, halved"]
directions: ["Combine milk, avocado, yogurt, and banana in a blender; blend until smooth. Divide between 2 glasses."]

title: Chocolate Christmas Trees
ingredients: ["2 (4 ounce) bars 85% dark chocolate, chopped"]
directions: ["Place chocolate in the top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and cool slightly.", "Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Spoon melted chocolate into a small resealable plastic bag and cut off a small corner.", "Pipe Christmas tree shape onto the parchment paper and allow to harden in a cool place overnight.", "Once the chocolate has hardened, carefully remove chocolate trees from paper and use to decorate Christmas cakes or desserts."]

title: Microwave Corn On The Cob
ingredients: ["1 ear corn, husked and cleaned"]
directions: ["Wet a paper towel, and wring out. Wrap the ear of corn in the moist towel, and place on a dinner plate. Cook in the microwave for 5 minutes. Carefully remove paper towel, and enjoy!"]

title: Microwave Corn-On-The-Cob In The Husk
ingredients: ["1 ear fresh corn in the husk"]
directions: ["Rinse entire ear of corn under water briefly. Wrap corn in a paper towel and place on a microwave-safe plate.", "Cook corn in the microwave oven until hot and cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from microwave and let rest for 2 minutes. Remove corn husk."]

title: Easy Baked Apples
ingredients: ["6 small apples, cored and halved", "2 cups sugar-free diet orange-flavored carbonated beverage"]
directions: ["Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).", "Arrange the apples into a baking dish with the cut sides facing down. Pour the orange beverage over the apples.", "Bake in the preheated oven until the apples are tender, about 1 hour."]

title: Blended Banana Ice Cream
ingredients: ["4 banana, sliced"]
directions: ["Place banana slices in a resealable freezer bag. Freeze until firm, about 1 hour.", "Empty banana slices into a blender; blend until creamy and the consistency of ice cream. Scoop into a bowl."]

title: Easy Pineapple Sorbet
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups orange juice", "1 cup frozen pineapple chunks"]
directions: ["Mix orange juice and pineapple in a blender on high speed until smooth. Transfer to a covered container; freeze for at least 5 hours."]

title: Roasted Peanuts
ingredients: ["1 pound raw peanuts, in shells"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).", "Arrange peanuts in a single layer on a cookie sheet, and place in the preheated oven.", "Turn oven off. Leave peanuts in oven for 1 hour without opening door. Serve warm or at room temperature."]

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ["2 bananas, broken into chunks", "2 cups milk", "1/2 cup peanut butter", "2 tablespoons honey, or to taste", "2 cups ice cubes"]
directions: ["Place bananas, milk, peanut butter, honey, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds."]

title: Homemade Honey Peanut Butter
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups roasted unsalted peanuts", "3 tablespoons honey"]
directions: ["Combine peanuts and honey in a food processor; process until peanuts are coarsely chopped, 1 to 2 minutes. Scrape down sides of the food processor bowl with a spatula. Continue processing until very smooth, 2 to 3 minutes more."]

title: Avocado Shake
ingredients: ["1 medium-large avocado, very ripe", "1 1/2 cups milk (or sweetened condensed milk if you want it to be thicker and sweeter, more like a dessert)", "1 tablespoon sugar (to taste)", "ice cube"]
directions: ["Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, scoop out the pulp, and place in a blender with the milk, sugar and ice cubes.", "Blend until smooth and frothy.", "Taste and add more sugar if you like.", "Serve immediately."]

title: Taco Fries
ingredients: ["2 tablespoons taco seasoning", "1 (26 ounce) bag frozen crispy French fries"]
directions: ["On baking sheets make a single layer of French fries.", "Bake until golden brown, about 12 minutes.", "In a bowl or bag, add fries and taco seasoning and shake until fries are coated.", "Serve immediately."]

title: Easy Concord Grape Juice
ingredients: ["To each sterilized quart jar", "2 cups washed and cleaned concord grapes", "1/2 cup sugar"]
directions: ["In sterilized jar place 2 cups grapes.", "Add 1/2 cup sugar.", "Fill to top with boiling water.", "Seal jars at once with 2 piece lids. Process in water-bath canner for 10 minutes. Remove from canner and keep out of drafts(cover with a towel). Next day remove metal lid-bands, and label with date and contents.", "Let juice stand 3 to 4 weeks before using.", "Strain juice from grapes and use juice."]

title: Sugar Free Pistachio Ice Cream - Freezer Made
ingredients: ["2 1/2 cups half-and-half", "1 (1 ounce) sugar-free instant pistachio pudding", "1/4 cup pistachios, coarsely chopped"]
directions: ["Put half and half and pudding mix in a medium size bowl and beat with a whisk for 2 minutes.", "Stir in pistachios.", "Pour into a metal cake pan and freeze at least 2 hours, until firm.", "Every 30 minutes, while freezing, stir frozen edges towards the center with a rubber spatula.", "Serve sprinkled with chopped pistachios."]

title: Apples And Peanut Butter (Apple Slices)
ingredients: ["1 firm eating apple (I like Gala the best)", "2 -4 tablespoons peanut butter (crunchy or creamy)"]
directions: ["Core and slice apple into wedges.", "Divide the peanut butter evenly among the slices. I usually spread mine along the inner edge.", "Enjoy!"]

title: Banana Orange Smoothie
ingredients: ["1 banana", "1 cup orange juice", "1 tablespoon honey"]
directions: ["Mix 1 cup orange juice, 1 banana, and 1 tablespoon honey in a blender on medium speed.", "Serve chilled."]

title: If Fudgy Brownies And Moist Cake Had A Baby Muffins
ingredients: ["1 (12 ounce) can Diet Coke", "1 (18 1/4 ounce) box moist chocolate cake mix"]
directions: ["Empty contents of cake mix into a bowl.", "Add can of Diet Soda and Beat for 2 Minutes.", "Pour mixture into well greased cupcake pans.", "Following Baking instructions on the box for cupcake pans.", "(I was told by my WW leader that 1 small muffin is 1point but if you have 2 count it as three. You can always use the nutrition facts on the side of the box for an estimate as I know their program has changed!)."]

title: Tiger Candy
ingredients: ["1/2 cup peanut butter", "1/4 cup instant milk", "1 tablespoon honey", "shredded coconut or chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix the peanut butter, dry milk, and honey together.", "Roll it into small balls. It is it too dry to roll, add a little more honey (up to 2 tablespoons).", "Roll the balls in the shredded coconut or chopped nuts."]

title: Two Ingredient Oatmeal Cookie
ingredients: ["2 bananas, large and old", "1 cup quick oats"]
directions: ["Mix those two together. Old bananas are amazing for this, but you can use fresh ones too.Then add in what sounds yummy to you! (or nothing!) We love:", "-a handful of chocolate chips.", "-crushed walnut pieces.", "-cinnamon.", "-raisins.", "Since all bananas are different sizes, the needed measurements can vary. If it seems too runny and the cookies would flatten out too much, add in more oatmeal. And make sure to not add in TOO many mix-ins as the cookies won't hold together very well. We cook them at 350 degrees for 15 minutes on a GREASED cookie sheet."]

title: Ww 1 Point Biscuit
ingredients: ["3 tablespoons skim milk", "1 1/2 teaspoons plain fat-free yogurt", "6 tablespoons self-rising flour"]
directions: ["Pre-heat oven 425.", "Mix ingredients and drop onto lightly sprayed cookie sheet.", "Bake for 13-16 minutes."]

title: Healthy High Protein Fruit Dip
ingredients: ["1/2 cup nonfat Greek yogurt", "1/4 cup peanut butter"]
directions: ["Mix together both ingredients.", "Store in refrigerator until ready to serve.", "One serving is 2 tbs.", "Serve with slices apples, grapes, or strawberries. Try carrots and celery.", "Or give it a go with pretzels and/or crackers for something savory."]

title: Pink Stuff ( Strawberry Jello, Pineapple Dessert )
ingredients: ["1 (12 ounce) can crushed pineapple", "1 (8 ounce) box strawberry Jell-O gelatin dessert", "1 (12 ounce) container Cool Whip", "1 (12 ounce) container cottage cheese"]
directions: ["Drain pineapples and cottage cheese.", "Mix together jello powder and cool whip.", "Mix in drained pineapple chunks and drained cottage cheese.", "Put in the fridge to cool or serve as is."]

title: Choco-Nana Mixer
ingredients: ["3 1/2 cups 1% low-fat milk", "1 (3 1/2 ounce) package chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix", "1 tablespoon creamy peanut butter", "1 medium banana, peeled cut into chunks"]
directions: ["Pour 2 cups milk, pudding mix, peanut butter and banana into into blender and blend on medium speed 1 minute or until smooth.", "Pour into large pitcher.", "Add remaining 1 1/2 cups milk; stir until blended.", "Serve at once or refrigerate and stir before serving.", "Mixture thickens as it stands."]

title: Mango Lada
ingredients: ["5 ounces pineapple juice", "4 ounces of pureed fresh mango", "5 ounces coconut milk (creme de coconut)", "1 tablespoon condensed milk (optional)"]
directions: ["Blend the pureed fresh mango and coconut milk with the pineapple juice.", "Add 10 cubes of ice and blend again until it's smooth. Add the condensed milk to sweeten. Stir and serve."]

title: Mandarin Orange Jello Salad
ingredients: ["8 ounces low fat cottage cheese", "8 ounces Cool Whip", "3 ounces orange Jell-O (sugar free is okay)", "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 (8 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained"]
directions: ["Sprinkle Jello over cottage cheese and stir.", "Add Cool Whip,then fruit."]

title: Morir Soando
ingredients: ["2 cups orange juice", "2 cups ice", "1 (12 ounce) can evaporated milk", "1/4 cup sugar or 1/4 cup sugar substitute, to taste"]
directions: ["Put all the ingredients in a blender and mix for about 2 mins until it becomes creamy and foamy on top.", "Enjoy!"]

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ["1 ripe and frozen banana", "2 tablespoons peanut butter", "1 cup milk"]
directions: ["Freeze your ripe banana.", "Cut banana in to cubes.", "Put in blender.", "Add peanut butter and milk.", "Blend til smooth."]

title: Peggy'S Hot Peanut Butter Topping For Ice Cream
ingredients: ["1 cup peanut butter", "brown sugar or white sugar"]
directions: ["Microwave peanut butter with enough sugar to taste for about 30 seconds. (Remember the ice cream will be sweet so the topping doesn't need to be as sweet. If you love sweet, go for it.).", "Stir well and keep microwaving and stirring every 20 to 40 seconds until completely hot and pour able.", "Taste to see if you like the peanut butter to sugar ratio and adjust accordingly.", "Pour over ice cream scoops.", "I don't really know if 1 cup of peanut butter will make four sundaes because I don't know how much ice cream you put in yours."]

title: 5 A Day Smoothie
ingredients: ["1 seedless orange", "1 banana", "1 sweet potato", "1 carrot, chopped", "1 cup orange juice"]
directions: ["Microwave sweet potato until soft.", "Scoop out pulp and put in blender.", "Peel orange and add to blender.", "Add banana, chopped carrot, and orange juice. Blend until smooth and creamy.", "Add ice cubes and water until desired thickness is achieved.", "Pour into glass and enjoy!"]

title: Edible Candles (Decoration For Banana Bread, Banoffee Cheesecake
ingredients: ["1 banana", "1 strawberry"]
directions: ["Cut each banana into 2 candle sticks. Do not do this step too far ahead or the banana will brown.", "Slice the sides of the strawberry so that you are left with a thick middle piece.", "Use a toothpick to fix the strawberry onto the banana."]

title: Coffee Foam In Microwave
ingredients: ["milk (2% to heavy cream)", "milk"]
directions: ["Find a jar with a lid and fill it with as much milk as you normally like in your coffee (or other hot beverage!). The milk should fill the jar no more than half way to allow room for the foam.", "Shake the jar with the lid on as hard as you can until the milk has become frothy and doubled in size. This takes us about 30 seconds.", "Take the lid off and microwave for 30 seconds. The foam will rise to the top of the milk and the heat from the microwave will help stabilize it.", "Pour the milk into your coffee using a spoon to hold back the foam. Then scoop the foam on top!"]

title: Easy Frozen Yogurt For Dogs
ingredients: ["1 tablespoon honey", "3 tablespoons peanut butter", "1 ripe banana", "16 ounces plain yogurt"]
directions: ["Mix the peanut butter, honey, and fruit together until well blended-mash with a fork or use the blender.", "Add the fruit mixture to the yogurt and mix well. Freeze in ice cube trays.", "Crack trays and release treats as needed!"]

title: Chocolate Curls
ingredients: ["8 ounces good quality dark chocolate", "1 chocolate cake, frosted"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in a double boiler over water.", "Spread out on cutting board so that it's about 1\" thick and in a rectangular shape.", "When chocolate as cooled enough to stiffen but not harden, cut crosswise at a 45 degree angle in very thin slices with a chef knife.", "Let harden, then place on top of cake in a tepee shape."]

title: Avocado Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ["1 avocado", "1 banana", "3 cups milk", "3 tablespoons sugar"]
directions: ["put avocado, banana, milk, sugar,put in to a blender.", "mix the ingredients with blender and ENJOY :)."]

title: Dip Graham Crackers
ingredients: ["8 ounces BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate", "16 graham crackers"]
directions: ["PLACE chocolate in a glass measuring cup.", "Microwave on MEDIUM power for 3 minutes; remove from oven and continue stirring until completely melted.", "DIP half of each cracker into the melted chocolate.", "Place cracker on a waxed paper-lined tray; chill.", "Makes 12 to 16 crackers."]

title: Low Fat Chocolate Ice Cream
ingredients: ["1 (4 ounce) package chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix", "1/4 cup granulated sugar", "1 (12 ounce) can evaporated skim milk (not sweetened condensed)", "1 cup skim milk"]
directions: ["Mix pudding powder and sugar in a bowl.", "Whisk in evaporated milk and skim milk until blended.", "Pour into ice-cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions.", "Pack into freezer container, cover tightly and freeze up to 1 month."]

title: Bananas And Milk
ingredients: ["2 bananas", "1/2 cup milk", "1 teaspoon sugar"]
directions: ["Peel bananas and remove from peels.", "Slice in 1/4\" bite sized slices.", "Place banana slices in a cereal sized bowl.", "Pour milk on top and sprinkle bananas with sugar.", "Enjoy!"]

title: Milk And Honey Cold Remedy
ingredients: ["8 ounces whole milk or 8 ounces 2% low-fat milk", "1 1/2 tablespoons honey"]
directions: ["Microwave the milk in a mug until piping hot, or about 1 minute 30 seconds.", "Stir in the honey completely, so that no honey is left sitting on the bottom and the milk turns a golden color. I use the measuring spoon to stir the honey in the milk.", "Drink hot."]

title: Japanese-Style Corn On The Cob
ingredients: ["4 ears corn, shucked", "1/2 cup soy sauce (more depending on taste)", "sugar, to taste (optional)"]
directions: ["Preheat grill to medium heat.", "Soak corn in room-temperature water for 20-30 minutes.", "Mix soy sauce and sugar.", "Cook over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, brushing all sides with soy sauce. I like mine to have lots of soy sauce, but it's really a matter of taste.", "Serve and enjoy!"]

title: Chocolate Mocha Milkshake
ingredients: ["2 cups ice cubes", "3 -4 teaspoons of nescafe chocolate mocha syrup", "3/4 cup milk"]
directions: ["Pour the syrup in the blender.", "Add the ice cubes and milk.", "Blend until smooth and enjoy!"]

title: Apples And Peanut Butter Dip
ingredients: ["1/2 cup creamy peanut butter", "8 ounces Cool Whip", "8 apples"]
directions: ["Put peanut butter in a medium bowl.", "Add about a quarter of the Cool Whip and stir until creamy.", "Add some more Cool Whip, stirring/ folding to further thin the peanut butter.", "Continue to add Cool Whip in batches until the dip is completely mixed.", "The trick is to mix completely but not mash any more of the air out of the Cool Whip than is necessary.", "It will taste great, regardless; but the texture is nicer, the lighter it is.", "The kids won't care, but adults might notice.", "Serve the peanut butter mixture with apple slices and dip away."]

title: Strawberry Jello Fluff Dessert
ingredients: ["1 pint strawberry, hulled, washed, thoroughly dried, then sliced", "1 (16 ounce) container small curd cottage cheese", "1 (3 ounce) package strawberry Jell-O gelatin dessert (unprepared, use powder only)", "1 (8 ounce) container Cool Whip, thawed", "1/3 cup chopped pecans"]
directions: ["In large mixing bowl, add jello powder to cottage cheese and mix well, scraping bottom and sides of bowl, until THOROUGHLY blended.", "Gently stir in sliced strawberries.", "Fold in thawed Cool Whip to blend, and transfer to serving dish.", "Top with chopped pecans, cover, and refrigerate at least 3 hours (preferably overnight)."]

title: Poor Man Spaghetti

title: Jungle Juice

directions: ["Blend together at medium speed until smooth.", "Suggestion: Can also add 8 0unces of non- fat vanilla yogurt for a breakfast on the go!"]

title: Making Skyr Yogurt
ingredients: ["1 tablespoon yogurt, vanilla skyr Siggis", "1 quart milk, any kind but whole milk is tastier", "1/2 cup powdered milk"]
directions: ["Safety check: yogurt cultures are a mix of bacteria developed for yogurt making. Since you will be growing bacteria, make sure it stays the good kind by remembering food safety cleanliness rules - boil all equipment or run it through your dishwasher if you can and always make sure to keep contaminated or unwashed items from touching any of the equipment, milk or cultures you are working with at all times.", "Mix the dry and liquid milk together and heat at least to 190\u00b0F Hold at that temperature for 10 minutes to give the proteins a chance to do their thing. Be careful not to ruin the batch by burning it on the bottom of the pot - you can use a double boiler if you have one.", "Cool the milk mix to at least 120\u00b0F but not below 100\u00b0F You can reheat the milk mix if it goes below 100\u00b0F.", "Put part or all of the cooked milk mix in a blender - depending on the size of your blender - with the tablespoon of Siggis (make sure you taste a bit of the Siggis if you haven't tasted it yet so you know what your results should taste like - and keep any extra in your freezer for your next batch) and blend well - 10 seconds should do it. Mix with any of the extra milk if your blender is not big enough to hold all the mixed cooked milk and Siggis.", "Pour the cooled, mixed and blended milk into 8 oz cups and place in your yogurt-maker (if you have one) and start it or put the cups in a cooler with a large bottle (quart or more) of hot water - at least 140\u00b0F Be sure the cups do not touch the water bottle. If the water is too hot, it will cook the yogurt rather than allow the yogurt culture to do it's thing.", "After 5 - 8 hours, check for firmness and if it is firm (will not jiggle if jostled), put in your fridge. Taste your new yogurt after it has had time to cool down in your fridge. (I have had yogurts firm up in as little as 3 hours and remember that the longer it continues in the yogurt maker or cooler, the more tangy your yogurt becomes.", "Please note that the \"cooking time\" shown here is really the culture time and it can vary from a couple-3 hours to 8 or more hours, with the temperature having the greatest effect on the length of time to complete. Too hot and it will cook - no yogurt; too cold and it will take forever/never - no yogurt. That is why we recommend a temperature controlled yogurt-maker of your own choosing.", "And the best news of all -- once you do this, you can make just about any kind of yogurt you want to - just buy either the active yogurt cultures (you can find them online) or buy a plain yogurt of the type you want with active cultures and make it according to the instructions in this recipe.", "Enjoy!"]

title: Ocean Spray Fresh Cranberry Orange Relish

The grinder is my preferred method, becaue that's how my Mom made it so many many years ago."]

title: Coffee-Mate Style Homemade Liquid Coffee Creamer

directions: ["Pour into a large jar and shake until combined. Add any of the following flavor combinations to the base mix.", "French Vanilla Creamer - 2 teaspoons vanilla extract or vanilla coffee syrup.", "Vanilla Bean Coffee Creamer - 2 teaspoons vanilla bean paste.", "Chocolate - 2-3 tablespoons chocolate syrup, (1 tsp vanilla extract, optional).", "Toasted Almond - 2 teaspoons almond extract.", "Coconut - 2 teaspoons coconut extract.", "Hazelnut - 2 teaspoons hazelnut extract.", "Chocolate Almond - 1 tablespoon cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon almond extract.", "Strudel - 1 tablespoon cinnamon, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon almond extract.", "Vanilla Caramel - 2 tablespoons caramel ice cream topping, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract.", "Chocolate Raspberry - 2 teaspoons cocoa powder, 2 tablespoons raspberry syrup.", "Irish Cream - 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup, 1 teaspoon instant coffee (Nescafe), 1-2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon almond extract.", "Samoa (like the Girl Scout Cookies) - 2 teaspoons coconut extract, 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup, 2 tablespoons caramel ice cream topping (you can also sub coconut milk or cream of coconut for the regular milk in the base mixture if you don't have coconut extract).", "Peppermint Patty - 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup, 1 teaspoon peppermint extract.", "Cinnamon Vanilla - 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract.", "Pumpkin Spice - 3 tablespoons pureed pumpkin, 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 4 tablespoons maple syrup, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract.", "Honey Vanilla - 1/4 cup honey, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract.", "Almond Joy - 1-2 teaspoons coconut extract (see Samoa), 1 teaspoon almond extract, 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup.", "Sweet Cream - Use 1 3/4 cups of heavy cream instead of the milk in the base recipe, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract or the inside of a vanilla bean, scraped, 1 teaspoon almond extract.", "Chocolate Orange - 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup, 1-2 teaspoons orange extract.", "Chocolate Hazelnut - 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup, 2 teaspoons hazelnut extract.", "Cinnamon Cake - 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract.", "Salted Caramel - 2-3 tablespoons caramel ice cream topping, 1/2 teaspoon salt.", "Eggnog - replace milk in base recipe with equal amount of heavy cream, 1 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 teaspoons rum extract, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg."]

title: Coconut Milk Kefir
ingredients: ["1 (13 1/2 ounce) can coconut milk (I used regular) or 2 cups coconut milk", "1 -2 tablespoon milk kefir grains (estimated, I used one large clump of grains)"]
directions: ["I used canned coconut milk which resulted in a slightly coconut flavored kefir. I understand you can use the coconut milk that comes in the dairy case in 1/2 gallon containers and that kefir made from it does not have a coconut flavor - I have not tried this yet.", "Be sure that you use a glass jar or plastic container and non-metal spatulas or spoons.", "If you are using kefir grains that have been kept in milk, rinse them with non-chlorinated water to remove milk residue. You do not need to do this if you are not sensitive to lactose.", "Shake the can of milk to combine the cream with the milk, then open and pour into the jar.", "Add the kefir grains to the jar. Cover with a clean cloth or coffee filter or something similar, and leave on a counter away from direct sunlight or in a cupboard.", "Coconut milk turns into kefir somewhat more quickly than does milk, 12 to 24 hours. In a heat wave, it was done in about 9 hours for me. The longer it stands, the tangier it gets.", "Stir the kefir and then strain it in a nylon mesh or stainless steel strainer. A spatula is helpful to gently lift the curds and pick out the kefir grains. Don't press down on the grains.", "Refrigerate the kefir for a day or so, where it will continue to thicken.", "I used it to make delicious smoothies. If you prefer a yogurt type of consistency, drain through a coffee filter or in a yogurt strainer to make a thicker consistency.", "Put the grains into a clean jar and start over. If you do not want to make more at this time, place in a container and cover by 1 inch with milk or cream it should be ok for a week or so.", "You can make coconut kefir for about two weeks, but after two weeks, rejuvenate the kefir grains in cow's or goat milk. Kefir grains will not grow and multiply in coconut milk, and they need the dairy milk to stay in peak condition."]

title: Ida'S Cranberry Relish
